A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: \"Star Wars: The Last Jedi honors the saga's rich legacy\" - you're f***ing kidding me? There was no honoring involed. It ruined Luke\, it scrapped everything J.J. Abrams wanted to foreshadow for this movie. It has no continuity not even with it's own trilogy let alone the saga's legacy. TFA also scrapped what George Lucas wanted to do.. This movie has nothing to do with Star Wars and everything to do with what's popular in the politically correct world.
